title: Space - From Earth to the Edge of the Universe [Astronomy][TNT]
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
				C. Stott, R, Dinwiddie, D Hughes, G.Sparrow 
			   Space: From Earth to the Edge of the Universe
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Original Title.......: Space: From Earth to the Edge of the Universe
Authors..............: Stott, Dinwiddie, Hughes, Sparrow            
ISBN-13..............: 978-0756667382                               
Language.............: English                                      
Year.................: 2000                                         
Format...............: PDF                                          
Length...............: 103.4 MB                                     
Pages................: 362                                          
Search...............: YES                                          
TOC links............: YES                                          

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Â«Featuring a wealth of incredible astronomical photographs,Space takes us 
on an imaginary journey that starts from a launchpad on Earth.From there, 
we go in toward the center of our Solar System to see the inner planets 
and the Sun. We then fly outward, past the outer planets and on to the 
fringes of the Solar System. After a brief pause to look back toward 
Earth, we pass into interstellar space to look at some of the trillion 
stars that make up the Milky Way. Moving further, we see other galaxies, 
some of them the scenes of extremely violent activity as material at their
 centers spirals into black holes. Finally, we look at the very edges of 
 the visible Universe and in doing so look back to a time soon after the 
 Big Bang.

The pictures taken of objects at these great distances tell us about how 
the Universe formed and how it might end. All the phenomena encountered 
throughout this journey are explained in amazing detail, resulting in an 
encyclopedic account of the Universe and our exploration of it.
